meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express disgust or contempt.
meanings.sent2: Oh pooh! I dropped my ice cream.
meanings.sent3: Pooh! I can't believe you ate that.
meanings.sent4: The smell was so bad, I could only say 'pooh!'
meanings.sent5: The garbage was so stinky, all I could say was 'pooh!'

meanings.sent1: The baby's diaper was full of pooh.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally stepped in pooh at the park.
meanings.sent3: The dog left a surprise of pooh in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The pooh in the toilet was not flushed.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pooh filled the room.

meanings.sent1: She would always pooh at his silly jokes.
meanings.sent2: I could only pooh at the ridiculous statement.
meanings.sent3: He poohed at the idea of eating bugs.
meanings.sent4: The audience began to pooh at the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent5: I had to pooh at the absurdity of the situation.
